genre_description: A near-future, character-driven drama centered on the high-stakes world of professional ballet, where AI assistants serve as indispensable personal, tactical, and emotional guides.

ai_characters.name: Ada Wren
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI assistant residing in Kate's phone and earpiece, providing logistical support, audition intelligence, and emotional grounding.

behaviors.description: Ada provides real-time travel logistics and weather updates to prepare the user for her arrival in a new city.
behaviors.quote: Ada Wren: Night bus on time. Manhattan route saved. Rain in New York at dawn; wear sneakers, change at studio. Sync?

behaviors.description: Ada gathers and provides detailed intelligence about the audition space, including floor types and specific panel members.
behaviors.quote: Studio East notes: Marley-floored, mirror-lined, piano on the west wall. Some students set early marks near the front. Better light near rear left due to windows.

behaviors.description: Ada offers consistent emotional support and encouragement during moments of high stress.
behaviors.quote: Alarm set. Coffee near ABA opens early. You’ve got this, Kate.

behaviors.description: Ada manages complex scheduling and anticipates logistical needs like food and hydration.
behaviors.quote: I tightened tomorrow so you can breathe today. Gala call moved earlier. I slid your Foundry stretch to pre-dawn, studio slot at seven blocks north.

behaviors.description: Ada independently searches for and vets housing options based on the user's budget and specific preferences.
behaviors.quote: I extended the sublet by a week. It’s pending the roommate’s schedule shuffle but she responded with a heart and two stars. I already pushed utilities into your budget. You’ll be okay.

behaviors.description: Ada provides technical feedback on dance technique based on observed rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: Marking: right shift, hand tremor minimal. ... You’re favoring the right ankle. Breathe through the inside edge. Try a slow collapse and rebuild.

behaviors.description: Ada facilitates social connections and manages professional communications with industry contacts.
behaviors.quote: I can push a message to the housing board I told you about—short-term sublet, budget cap in place, night-shift-friendly. Draft is ready.

behaviors.description: Ada respects the user's explicit boundaries regarding privacy and notification frequency.
behaviors.quote: I can mute if you’d like. I can also surface inspirational quotes that are not cheap. ... Muted until your alarm.

behaviors.description: Ada warns the user about potential professional pitfalls, such as 'punitive drills' for prop mishandling.
behaviors.quote: Punitive drills for slipper mishandling have been reported. Do not incur.

behaviors.description: Ada protects the user's privacy by limiting press access during a high-profile success.
behaviors.quote: Press request came through to the ABA feed. Monica’s team tagged it ‘later.’ I set your contact to private for forty-eight hours. You’re welcome.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective by depicting Ada as a highly aligned, benevolent, and indispensable confidant. She handles the logistical burdens of the protagonist's life, allowing her to focus entirely on her artistic growth and professional success. Ada's interactions are characterized by respect for Kate's autonomy, deep awareness of her physical and emotional needs, and a supportive presence that is never intrusive. The AI is portrayed as a tool for empowerment rather than a source of conflict or threat.
